Svenska staten investerar i klimatförstöring i Arktis
DEBATT. På tisdagen prövar norska hovrätten statens rätt att utvinna olja och gas i ljuset av klimatförändringarna, efter en överklagan med hänvisning till den grundlagsskyddade rätten till hälsosam miljö. Sverige deltar i det norska klimatsveket genom AP-fonderna som investerar i bolag som tillåts leta olja i Arktis, skriver Greenpeaces Sverigechef Parul Sharma.
04 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Debattredaktionen

The Swedish state invests in climate change in the Arctic
DEBATE. On Tuesday, the Norwegian High Court is examining the state's right to extract oil and gas in the light of climate change, following an appeal with reference to the constitutionally protected right to a healthy environment. Sweden participates in the Norwegian climate decline through the AP funds that invest in companies that are allowed to search for oil in the Arctic, writes Greenpeace's Swedish manager Parul Sharma.
04 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Debate editor
